summary: Full e2e testing of LLMMatch app. Backend 11/11 tests pass. Frontend all critical flows verified - HomePage, FormPage 3-step wizard, ResultPage, ModelsPage all working correctly.

issues: Hero section text appears very dim/low contrast in screenshot due to fade-in animation - cards and text barely visible on initial render. May just be animation timing in screenshot.
Table uses div-based rows instead of <table><tbody><tr> elements - cosmetic architecture choice, no functional issue

critical_code_review_comments: server.py imports motor/MongoDB but app doesn't use a database - MongoDB client initialized but only KNOWLEDGE_BASE JSON is used. Minor unnecessary dependency.
ML model trains in a background thread using blocking threading.Thread - if training is slow it won't block the API, which is fine.
seed_data_creation: None - app uses knowledge_base.json with 20 pre-seeded LLMs
context_for_next_testing_agent: All flows working. Backend: /api/health, /api/models (20 items), /api/recommend (all 6 task types) all pass. Frontend: HomePage hero, 4 stats, ModelsPage with search/filter (div-based table not <table>), Form 3-step wizard (task cards, latency, context, deployment, priority), Results page (top pick, 2 alternatives, score bars, visit link, try again). No bugs found.
